Thomas Nowakowski

Thomas has made a career out of trading financial securities. Starting in the USA as a securities broker, he quickly advanced to overseeing risk management of options and futures trading globally for Bank of America’s dealing desks. Opening and running a European based affiliate office of a US hedge fund, Thomas has hired and trained numerous traders to a professional level.

After years of trading futures, FX options, and FX spot, Thomas augmented his choice of market instruments with a passion for trading Binary Indices. Combining his trading experience across various markets, Thomas has developed a proprietary methodology to achieve more than an 80% success rate in trading of binary index options. Recognized for delivering and generating effective trading signals to clients via his trading signal service Premier Trading Group, Thomas will make an exceptional and exclusive presentation for Binary.com clients, sharing his institutional insights of successfully trading.

Thomas, has been awarded a Master’s Degree in International Finance, and his professional accreditations include securities broker (Series 7) license, futures broker (Series 3) license, fund manager (CTA) license in USA and has an Australian REG146 advisory compliance credential, and a Diploma of Financial Planning. Having lived in USA, Europe, Asia and Australia, Thomas speaks several languages and shares a passion and interest in international politics and events.

About Premier Trading Group

Premier Trading Group is a company run by traders for the benefit of the trading and investment industry. At PTG, we believe better investment returns can be achieved without the middleman. In order to provide better returns to the public, PTG offers 3 main pillars of services:

  1. Trading Education – improving the quality of self-directed traders.
  2. Investment Research/Trading Signals – for clients seeking trading guidance and investment recommendations.
  3. Trading Execution/Capital Management – for clients that are not interested in the market participation, just the investment returns.

PTG caters to anyone with interest in the financial markets:

  • Consumers of investment analysis/research
  • Disciplined overachievers seeking to attain new levels of capital markets proficiency
  • Traders seeking live assistance in identifying trading opportunities
  • Passive Investors purely seeking investment returns.

Advice From Thomas

Forecasting market movements is not a science that can be purely derived through mathematical means. Chaotic elements are also present in the ultimate market movement equation such as – earthquakes, tsunamis, accidents, wars, political events, release of economic data, political statements. Moreover, fear and greed are the dominant emotions driving markets with no mathematical yardsticks to measure the amounts at play, nor existing logic behind them.

Reading Market Sentiment and attaining Emotional Maturity in trading, is the appropriate response to inherent market's random movements. Emotional elements of trading can only be learned by trading experience, ideally in an environment under guidelines of an experienced professional trader.
